alert.note: Alert for Union (South Dakota) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.senderName: NWS Sioux Falls (Southeastern SD, Southwestern MN, and Northwestern IA)
info.headline: Severe Thunderstorm Warning issued May 12 at 6:35PM MDT until May 12 at 7:15PM MDT by NWS Sioux Falls
info.description: The National Weather Service in Sioux Falls has issued a * Severe Thunderstorm Warning for... Cherokee County in northwestern Iowa... Sioux County in northwestern Iowa... Northeastern Plymouth County in northwestern Iowa... Northwestern Buena Vista County in northwestern Iowa... Southwestern Clay County in northwestern Iowa... Southwestern O`Brien County in northwestern Iowa... Northwestern Ida County in west central Iowa... Northeastern Union County in southeastern South Dakota... * Until 815 PM CDT. * At 734 PM CDT, severe thunderstorms were located along a line extending from near Hawarden to Holstein, moving northeast at 45 mph. HAZARD...70 mph wind gusts and half dollar size hail. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Hail damage to vehicles is expected. Expect considerable tree damage. Wind damage is also likely to mobile homes, roofs, and outbuildings. * Severe thunderstorms will be near... Quimby and Washta around 740 PM CDT. Sioux Center and Orange City around 750 PM CDT. Other locations in the path of these severe thunderstorms include Cherokee, Aurelia, Hull, Alta, Boyden, Hospers, Matlock, Sheldon and Peterson. THUNDERSTORM DAMAGE THREAT...CONSIDERABLE HAIL THREAT...RADAR INDICATED MAX HAIL SIZE...1.25 IN WIND THREAT...RADAR INDICATED MAX WIND GUST...70 MPH
info.instruction: For your protection move to an interior room on the lowest floor of a building.
